name: Exeggcute

evolution.description: Exeggcute can evolve into Exeggutor at level 8 and above with the help of a Leaf Stone or Alolan Exeggutor at level 8 and above with the help of an Alola Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Egg Pokémon. The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be six heads for it to maintain balance.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: At the end of this Pokémon's turn, if it used a berry, roll 1d4. On a result of 3 or 4, it regains that berry as a held item.
